metadata.title: CVE-2024-50343 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: symfony/validator is a module for the Symphony PHP framework which providestools to validate values. It is possible to trick a `Validator` configuredwith a regular expression using the `$` metacharacters, with an inputending with `\n`. Symfony as of versions 5.4.43, 6.4.11, and 7.1.4 now usesthe `D` regex modifier to match the entire input. Users are advised toupgrade. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: symfony package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
